briefdescription.para: Sets AMD Radeonâ„¢ Boost to enabled or disabled on a GPU.

entry.para: The new AMD Radeon Boost state. Set true to enable AMD Radeon Boost. Set false to disable AMD Radeon Boost.

detaileddescription.para: If the state of AMD Radeon Boost is successfully set, ADLX_OK is returned. If the state of AMD Radeon Boost is not successfully set, an error code is returned. Refer to ADLX_RESULT for success codes and error codes.
AMD Radeon Boost dynamically reduces resolution during motion to improve performance with little perceptible impact on image quality. Note: Only works in supported games.
AMD Radeon Boost cannot be simultaneously enabled with AMD Radeon Chill.
On some AMD GPUs, AMD Radeon Boost cannot be simultaneously enabled with Radeon Super Resolution.
When AMD Radeon Boost is enabled, the mutually exclusive features are automatically disabled. If a mutually exclusive feature is re-enabled, its previous configuration settings are restored.
